item.title: 美联储为减息敞开大门，日本央行将讨论加息时机
item.description: 日本央行将于周三详细说明缩减巨额债券购买的计划，并就下一次加息的时间进行辩论，这表明日本央行决心稳步解除十年来的大规模货币刺激政策。【原文：The Bank of Japan will detail plans to taper its huge bond buying and debate the timing of a next interest rate hike on Wednesday, signalling its resolve to steadily unwind a decade of massive monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 美联储和日本央行会议前，石油下滑，亚洲股市下跌
item.description: 由于需求前景疲软拖累大宗商品，周二石油市场接近七周低点，而债券、货币和股票市场在美国和日本央行会议以及一系列主要企业财报公布前交投谨慎。【原文：Oil traded near seven-week lows on Tuesday as a softening demand outlook weighed on commodities, while bond, currency and stock markets traded cautiously ahead of central bank meetings in the U.S. and Japan and a slew of major corporate earnings reports.】

item.title: 在日本央行和美联储会议之前，美元和日元维持区间震荡
item.description: 周二，在日本央行和美联储周中货币政策会议拉开帷幕之际，交易员们正在等待一系列重要的央行决定，美元和日元汇率保持在接近区间内波动。【原文：The dollar and yen kept within close ranges on Tuesday as traders awaited a barrage of key central bank decisions, kicking off with midweek monetary policy meetings from the Bank of Japan and Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 油价因中国需求担忧和中东忧虑减弱而下滑
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价下滑，延续了上一交易日的跌势，原因是对中国需求的担忧，以及市场对中东冲突升级风险的回避。【原文：Oil prices slipped in early Asian trading on Tuesday, extending losses from the previous session, over concerns about Chinese demand and as the market shrugged off the risk of conflict escalating in the Middle East.】

item.title: 上诉法院阻止美国航空收费披露规定
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周一阻止了美国交通部要求预先披露航空公司费用的新规定，以待对该规定进行全面审查。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Monday blocked the U.S. Transportation Department's new rule requiring upfront disclosure of airline fees pending a full review of the regulation.】

item.title: 必和必拓与伦丁矿业公司将以 32.5 亿美元收购 Filo 公司
item.description: 全球矿业公司必和必拓集团（BHP Group）和加拿大上市公司隆丁矿业公司（Lundin Mining）周一表示，将以 45 亿加元（32.5 亿美元）的价格收购勘探公司 Filo Corp，以推进 Filo del Sol 和 Josemaria 项目。【原文：Global miner BHP Group and Canada-listed Lundin Mining will takeover explorer Filo Corp for C$4.5 billion ($3.25 billion), the companies said on Monday, as they move to progress the Filo del Sol and Josemaria projects.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，广告集团 WPP 任命英国电信前老板菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）为新主席
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引知情人士的话报道称，英国 WPP 公司将选择英国电信集团前首席执行官菲利普-詹森（Philip Jansen）担任新主席。【原文：Britain's WPP is set to pick former BT Group chief Philip Jansen as its new chair, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本 6 月失业率降至 2.5%，职位供应量下滑
item.description: 日本政府周二公布的数据显示，日本 6 月份的失业率较上月下降至 2.5%。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in June fell to 2.5% from the previous month, government data showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: Meta 允许用户创建自定义人工智能角色
item.description: Meta Platforms 周一表示，它将推出一款名为 AI Studio 的新工具，允许用户创建、共享和设计个性化的人工智能聊天机器人。【原文：Meta Platforms on Monday said it will roll out a new tool called AI Studio that will allow users to create, share and design personalized AI chatbots.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡计划未来五年在美投资 300 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡计划未来五年在美国投资 300 亿美元，投资领域包括医疗保健和金融服务。【原文：Singapore state investor Temasek plans to invest up to $30 billion over the next five years in the US in sectors such as healthcare and financial services.】

item.title: 苹果称未使用英伟达 GPU 训练人工智能模型
item.description: 据苹果公司周一发表的一份研究报告称，苹果公司依靠 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司设计的芯片，而不是业界领先的英伟达公司（Nvidia）来构建新的人工智能软件基础设施，为其即将推出的人工智能工具和功能套件提供动力。【原文：Apple relied on chips designed by Alphabet's Google rather than industry leader Nvidia to build its new artificial-intelligence software infrastructure that will power its forthcoming suite of AI tools and features, according to an Apple research paper it published on Monday.】

item.title: 早间竞价等待美联储和日本央行的博弈
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司放弃 2030 年碳强度降低目标
item.description: 新西兰航空公司周二表示，由于在机队更新和燃料供应方面面临挑战，将放弃 2030 年碳强度减排目标。【原文：Air New Zealand said on Tuesday would drop its 2030 carbon intensity reduction target due to challenges faced in fleet renewal and fuel availability.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，达美航空公司将就网络故障寻求赔偿
item.description: 据 CNBC 周一报道，达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）已聘请了一家律师事务所，并将就本月早些时候导致全球航班中断的全球网络中断事件向微软和 CrowdStrike 寻求赔偿。【原文：Delta Air Lines has hired a law firm and will seek compensation from Microsoft and CrowdStrike over the global cyber outage earlier this month that disrupted flights around the world, CNBC reported on Monday.】

item.title: 切萨皮克第二季度出现亏损，原因是价格持续走低
item.description: 天然气生产商切萨皮克能源公司（Chesapeake Energy）周一报告称，由于天然气价格持续疲软，该公司第二季度出现亏损，而去年同期则实现了盈利。【原文：Natural gas producer Chesapeake Energy on Monday reported a second-quarter loss, compared to a year-ago profit, dented by persistently weak prices for the commodity.】

item.title: Charter 将支付 1500 万美元解决美国对网络中断规则的调查
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会（Federal Communications Commission）周一表示，Charter Communications 将支付 1500 万美元的民事罚款，以解决对遵守网络和 911 故障通知规定的调查。【原文：Charter Communications will pay a $15 million civil penalty to resolve an investigation into compliance with network and 911 outage notification rules, the Federal Communications Commission said on Monday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，斯玛克寻求剥离饼干品牌 Voortman
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，主要以生产果酱和果冻闻名的 J.M. Smucker 公司正在探索出售 Voortman Bakery 公司，该交易对饼干和威化饼品牌的估值可能超过 3.5 亿美元。【原文：J.M. Smucker , known primarily for its jams and jellies, is exploring a sale of Voortman Bakery in a deal that could value the cookie and wafer brand at more than $350 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富国银行必须面对虚假求职面试的诉讼
item.description: 一名美国法官命令富国银行面对一项诉讼，该诉讼指控富国银行在宣称其致力于招聘多元化的同时，对非白人和女性求职者进行虚假的工作面试，而富国银行根本没有计划聘用这些求职者，从而欺骗了股东。【原文：A U.S. judge ordered Wells Fargo to face a lawsuit alleging it defrauded shareholders by proclaiming its commitment to hiring diversity, even as it conducted sham job interviews of non-white and female applicants it had no plans to hire.】

item.title: 西南航空终止开放式座位的举措能否奏效？
item.description: 西南航空公司取消开放式座位的计划是该公司增加急需收入的一种方式，但同时也带来了疏远忠实顾客的风险。【原文：Southwest Airlines' plan to eliminate open seating is one way for the company to raise much-needed revenue, but it comes with the risk of alienating loyal customers.】

item.title: Sacyr 聘请桑坦德银行和德意志银行为顾问寻找合作伙伴
item.description: 一位公司消息人士周一告诉路透社，西班牙建筑公司 Sacyr 聘请桑坦德银行（Santander）和德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）担任财务顾问，为新部门 Voreantis 寻找合作伙伴，以筹集现金，更好地与大型竞争对手竞争美国等国的合同。【原文：Spanish construction firm Sacyr hired Santander and Deutsche Bank as financial advisers to find a partner for new unit Voreantis as a way to raise cash and better compete with larger rivals for contracts in countries such as the United States, a company source told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 听取美国关于医疗保险协商价格的意见后，制药公司的担忧有所减少
item.description: 参与美国首次医疗保险计划价格谈判的四家制药公司表示，在看到政府为其药品提出的将于 2026 年生效的保密建议价格后，预计不会对其业务产生重大影响。【原文：Four pharmaceutical companies involved in the first U.S. negotiations over prices for the Medicare program said they do not expect a significant impact on their businesses after seeing confidential suggested prices from the government for their drugs that will take effect in 2026.】

item.title: 独家报道太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）正在洽谈在澳大利亚海岸降落和回收 "星际飞船 "火箭的事宜
item.description: 据三位熟悉该计划的人士透露，SpaceX 公司正在与美国和澳大利亚官员商谈在澳大利亚海岸登陆并回收其一枚星际飞船火箭的事宜，这可能是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的公司在两国加强安全关系的背景下在该地区扩大影响力的第一步。【原文：SpaceX is in talks with U.S. and Australian officials to land and recover one of its Starship rockets off Australia's coast, a possible first step toward a bigger presence for Elon Musk's company in the region as the two countries bolster security ties, according to three people familiar with the plans.】

item.title: 阿玛尼上半年销售额下降 "个位数
item.description: 意大利时装品牌乔治-阿玛尼（Giorgio Armani）去年的营业利润保持稳定，按固定汇率计算的净销售额增长了 6%，尽管下半年的收入出现了 "个位数 "的放缓，而且今年仍在继续。【原文：Italian fashion house Giorgio Armani managed to keep its operating profit steady last year and grow net sales by 6% at constant currencies, despite a 'single-digit' slowdown in revenues in the second half which continued this year.】

item.title: 空客计划重组太空系统，合并谈判仍在继续
item.description: 业内消息人士称，空中客车公司正在为其太空系统业务制定新的扭亏计划，并就潜在的欧洲合并进行谈判，以抵御包括意大利莱昂纳多公司和法国泰雷兹公司在内的竞争对手。【原文：Airbus is drawing up a new turnaround plan for its Space Systems business, industry sources said, adding talks over potential European consolidation to fend off competition include Italy's Leonardo as well as France's Thales.】

item.title: 特斯拉一跃取代福特，成为摩根士丹利在美国汽车行业的 "最佳选择
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）将特斯拉评为美国汽车行业 "最有价值汽车制造商"，取代福特汽车，特斯拉股价周一大涨近 6%。【原文：Tesla shares jumped nearly 6% on Monday after Morgan Stanley named the most valuable automaker its "top pick" in the U.S. automotive industry, replacing Ford .】

item.title: 贴现窗口改革法案出台，美联储正着手自身改革
item.description: 美联储正在努力全面改革一项关键的紧急贷款机制，银行历来对此感到焦虑，现在国会也可能采取行动。【原文：Federal Reserve efforts to overhaul a key emergency lending facility historically viewed with anxiety by banks are now being joined by potential congressional action.】

item.title: 分析师称，大型视频游戏发行商在罢工期间受到内部工作室的保护
item.description: 分析师说，由于电子艺界和 Take-Two 等大型视频游戏发行商都有自己的工作室，而且游戏开发周期较长，因此它们很可能不会因配音演员和动作捕捉艺术家罢工而遭受重创。【原文：Major video game publishers including Electronic Arts and Take-Two will likely stave off a big hit from the strike by voice actors and motion-capture artists due to their in-house studios and the lengthy development cycles for games, analysts said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，惠普将无条件获得欧盟批准 140 亿美元的瞻博网络交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，惠普企业公司（HPE）以 140 亿美元收购网络设备制造商瞻博网络（Juniper Networks）的交易有望获得欧盟无条件的反垄断批准。【原文：Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is expected to secure unconditional EU antitrust approval for its $14 billion acquisition of networking gear maker Juniper Networks , people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 丰田董事长警告称，如果投资者支持率继续下降，他可能会失去董事会席位
item.description: 据周一发表的一篇采访报道，丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男表示，如果股东对他的支持率继续以今年的速度下降，他可能不会连任董事。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda said he may not be reelected as a director if shareholder support for him continues to fall at the pace it did this year, according to an interview published on Monday.】

item.title: 保费和投资收益强劲，Loews 盈利增加；任命新首席执行官
item.description: Loews 周一表示，在执掌公司 25 年后，James Tisch 将把首席执行官一职移交给自己的儿子。该公司还报告称，由于保险费上涨和投资回报率提高，季度利润跃升了 2.5%。【原文：Loews said on Monday that James Tisch will hand over the CEO role to his son after 25 years at the helm. The company also reported a 2.5% jump in its quarterly profit, helped by a rise in insurance premiums and higher returns on its investments.】
